00002 #define HW_LCD_H

00004 /*$PAGE*/
00005 /*
00006 *********************************************************************************************************
00007 *  File: hw_lcd.h
00008 *  Author: Omer Farooq
00009 *  Date:   14-December-05
00010 *
00011 * Header file for LCD driver.
00012 * 
00013 * NOTE: Most of the comments in this file are from orignal lcd.s provided
00014 *       by Dr. Philips.
00015 *********************************************************************************************************
00016 */
00017 
00018 /*
00019 *********************************************************************************************************
00020 *                                             CONSTANTS
00021 *********************************************************************************************************
00022 */  
00023 #define LCD_FUNSET    0x3C
00024 #define LCD_OFF           0x08
00025 #define LCD_CLR           0x01
00026 #define LCD_EMS           0x06
00027 #define LCD_ON        0x0f
00028 
00029 #define LCD_LINE0         0x00
00030 #define LCD_LINE1         0x40
00031 #define LCD_LINE_SZ   0x14
00032 #define LCD_HOME          0x02
00033 
00034 /* 
00035  * This must be written to P5OUT before changing from write to read mode
00036  * the LCD is interfaced through 5-3.3V open collector non-inverting buffers
00037  * writing a one (1) releases the buffer's hard pull-down preventing
00038  * contestion on the line when the LCD tries to drive it
00039  * there is still a strong pull-up to 5V through a 2.2K Ohm resistor. 
00040  */
00041 #define LCD_OUT2IN        0xFF
00042 
00043 /* SW init equates */
00044 #define LCD_INIT          0x30
00045 
00046 /*
00047  * the delay loop takes n*3(for the dec&jnz) + 5(for the call) + 3(for the ret)
00048  * cycles @ MCLK = 7.3728 MHz
00049  * this needs to be > 15ms
00050  */
00051 #define LCD_INIT_WAIT0 0x8FFE
00052 
00053 /*  > 4.1ms */
00054 #define LCD_INIT_WAIT1 0x275A
00055 
00056 /*  > 100us */
00057 #define LCD_INIT_WAIT2 0x00F4
00058 
00059 /*
00060 *********************************************************************************************************
00061 *                                             FUNCTION PROTOTYPES
00062 *********************************************************************************************************
00063 */
00064 void InitLCD();
00065 void ClearLCD();
00066 void WriteCharToLCD(char character);
00067 void WriteStringToLCD(const char* msg);
00068 void SetLCDCursorPosition(unsigned int position);
00069 void SetDisplyDDRAMPosition(unsigned int position);
00070 
00071 #endif /* HW_LCD_H */
